title: DCU Mobile Banking
description: DCU’s Mobile Banking App gives you quick, convenient access to most Online Banking features with your Android phone or tablet from nearly anywhere!Manage Your DCU Accounts* View balances, current and pending transactions, and account history* Transfer between your primary and joint accounts* Make payments to any of your DCU loans* Transfer balances from other credit cards to your DCU Visa® Platinum CardMake Payments* Add, remove, and schedule payments to billers with Bill Pay* Send money to friends and family easily using People Pay* Make one-time or recurring payments to your DCU loans and accounts from other institutions with Payment CenterMobile Account Manager* Update the contact information on file for your membership* Manage Quick Balance accounts to view in your widget* Add DCU members to your cross account transfer list* Add Travel Notifications to your account to let us know you’ll be using your cards outside of your normal purchase areas* Apply for new loans* Take advantage of loan preapproval offersDeposit Checks* Skip the branch line and make check deposits from anywhere*Messages* View important messages and account alerts from DCULocate and Contact Us* Find branches and ATMs nearby with the Locator tool* Contact a DCU Representative by phone or email to answer questions related to your membership*Upon approval.
descriptionHTML:
DCU’s Mobile Banking App gives you quick, convenient access to most Online Banking features with your Android phone or tablet from nearly anywhere!

Manage Your DCU Accounts
* View balances, current and pending transactions, and account history
* Transfer between your primary and joint accounts
* Make payments to any of your DCU loans
* Transfer balances from other credit cards to your DCU Visa® Platinum Card

Make Payments
* Add, remove, and schedule payments to billers with Bill Pay
* Send money to friends and family easily using People Pay
* Make one-time or recurring payments to your DCU loans and accounts from other institutions with Payment Center

Mobile Account Manager
* Update the contact information on file for your membership
* Manage Quick Balance accounts to view in your widget
* Add DCU members to your cross account transfer list
* Add Travel Notifications to your account to let us know you’ll be using your cards outside of your normal purchase areas
* Apply for new loans
* Take advantage of loan preapproval offers

Deposit Checks
* Skip the branch line and make check deposits from anywhere*

Messages
* View important messages and account alerts from DCU

Locate and Contact Us
* Find branches and ATMs nearby with the Locator tool
* Contact a DCU Representative by phone or email to answer questions related to your membership

*Upon approval.
comments: This app is very helpful and has everything needed just like going online. The only problem is that  there is no multiple logins to access more than one account. I cannot see the fingerprint sign in option on the app. My phone has a fingerprint sensor running the latest software version

Takes way too long to process a simple deposit. Also you should not have to write a resume on the back of your check to make a deposit. It's bad enough that you have to put a signature and your specific account number. When it comes to for deposit only, date, yada yada yada gets a little ridiculous...
Even after enabling fingerprint login it always ask for my member ID and password and also I enabled quick balance still I got to register the device always!! Worst app!!

I am using OxygenOS Version 4.5.14 on OnePlus 5, this app does not allow to login, it keep saying "Authentication Error, An unspecified system error has occurred" However I can login with other android OS with same credentials.  Need help on this

I absolutely LOVE this app. I have a car payment and set up people pay. U can do it from the app instead of having to do it online. Never had any issues. I LOVE the way dcu is taking this digital first option. I recommend dcu to everyone. Screw banks. Credit unions are where it's at!
The app sucks. Checking the recurring payments is tough. There is no direct link to check my auto loan payment. Very poorly designed!
recentChanges: * Suppressed deposit limit for mobile deposit - allowing for members to deposit items at any amount (review and approval process will still be required where necessary)
Version 4.5 fixes minor UI bug in mobile deposit
